attributes.action: Not to amend the Civil Partnership Act 2004 to allow Civil Ceremonies in churches.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Long standing institutions such as the Church of England should not expect to bend to pressure from non conformists and athiests to hold Civil ceremonies upon their premises. This makes a mockery of the teachings and values held dear to those who are religious. This is a Christian Country. Why should someones belief be diminished for the sake of another belief. Political correctness cannot be allowed to creep in to everything that has been the backbone of this country for so long.
